previewArea.empty: Enter teaching prompts on the left, then click "Debug" to experience learning simulation

previewArea.variablesDescription: Different learners set different variables to get different courses
previewArea.variablesHideUnusedConfirmDesc: This will hide all custom variables that are not referenced in the course prompts. Hidden variables will not appear in the debug area until restored.
previewArea.variablesRestoreHiddenConfirmDesc: All hidden custom variables will reappear in the debug area and can be used during editing.
